name: Nutty Squirrel
description:
The squirrel moves towards the acorn, only if he finds a way.

Do not fall into the traps (red crosses).

Rotate view using LEFT and RIGHT.

Submission for the Weekly Hour Game Jam W9 2017.

Done in an afternoon. The first design was the squirrel always moving forward, with arrows turning him. But this limited maps, so I came with the idea of pathfinding. Nonetheless, designing the maps was actually very long.

Voxel Squirrel by rbreve
